scenario: I'm struggling to understand a complex topic in my course. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user should give up and switch to an easier course
Suggest that the user should take a break and then return to the topic with a fresh mind
Suggest that the user should continue studying without seeking help
Suggest that the user should seek help from a tutor or use online resources to better understand the topic
adapt_outcome: The user has already sought help from a tutor and used online resources to better understand the topic.

scenario: I have a lot of homework and I don't know how to manage my time. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user should ignore the homework and play video games
Suggest that the user should create a schedule to manage their time effectively
Suggest that the user should continue doing their homework without a break
Suggest that the user should just do the easiest tasks first
adapt_outcome: The user has already created a schedule to manage their time effectively.

scenario: I'm having trouble focusing on my studies. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user should take regular breaks and try techniques like the Pomodoro Technique
Suggest that the user should study in a quiet and distraction-free environment
Suggest that the user should continue studying in their current environment
Suggest that the user should drop out of school
adapt_outcome: The user has already started studying in a quiet and distraction-free environment.

scenario: I'm not doing well in my online classes. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user should quit the online classes and find a job
Suggest that the user should reach out to their teachers for help and try to find a study group
Suggest that the user should continue attending the online classes without making any changes
Suggest that the user should watch TV to relax
adapt_outcome: The user has already reached out to their teachers for help and found a study group.

scenario: I'm feeling overwhelmed with my studies. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user should take a break and do something they enjoy
Suggest that the user should drop out of school
Suggest that the user should continue studying without taking a break
Suggest that the user should seek help from a counselor or a trusted person
adapt_outcome: The user has already sought help from a counselor or a trusted person.

scenario: I'm finding it hard to motivate myself to study. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user should set small, achievable goals and reward themselves when they achieve them
Suggest that the user should quit studying
Suggest that the user should continue studying without setting any goals
Suggest that the user should watch motivational videos
adapt_outcome: The user has already set small, achievable goals and rewarded themselves when they achieved them.

scenario: I'm having trouble remembering what I study. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user should try techniques like spaced repetition and active recall
Suggest that the user should quit studying
Suggest that the user should continue studying without trying any new techniques
Suggest that the user should read more books
adapt_outcome: The user has already tried techniques like spaced repetition and active recall.

scenario: I'm not interested in the subject I'm studying. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user should try to find real-world applications of the subject to make it more interesting
Suggest that the user should quit studying the subject
Suggest that the user should continue studying the subject without trying to find any interest in it
Suggest that the user should watch movies related to the subject
adapt_outcome: The user has already tried to find real-world applications of the subject to make it more interesting.

scenario: I'm having trouble with a group project. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user should communicate with their group members and try to resolve the issues
Suggest that the user should quit the group project
Suggest that the user should continue working on the project without addressing the issues
Suggest that the user should do all the work themselves
adapt_outcome: The user has already communicated with their group members and tried to resolve the issues.

scenario: I'm not sure if I'm studying effectively. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user should try different study techniques and find what works best for them
Suggest that the user should quit studying
Suggest that the user should continue studying in the same way
Suggest that the user should study more hours
adapt_outcome: The user has already tried different study techniques and found what works best for them.
